string.text:
%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:
 
%c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] most 7.62x51 NATO rifles
 
%c[ui_gray_1]A modern 7.62x51 NATO silencer. Currently employed by various SOF and Law Enforcement agencies, and feature an innovative mounting method, providing effective flash and sound suppression.
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Condition: %c[ui_gray_1]good
